Author: Moseby, K. E.; Lollback, G. W.; Lynch, C. E.
Title: Too much of a good-thing, successful reintroduction leads to overpopulation in a threatened mammal
Observations: looks at density of bettongs, not shrub density and does not have any info on facilitative or positive interactions

Author: Morales-Paredes, Carlos; Valdivia, Carlos E.; Orellana, Jose I.
Title: Bird-mediated effect of deforestation on potential seed dispersal does not increase the seed recruitment of Fuchsia magellanica
Observations: Has no data on shrub density at all and no data on positive interations or facilitation (Does mention positive interactions though)

Author: Wheeler, Helen C.; Hoye, Toke T.; Svenning, Jens-Christian
Title: Wildlife species benefitting from a greener Arctic are most sensitive to shrub cover at leading range edges
Observations: has data of both positive and negative interactions but does not have any data regarding shrub density

Author: Holbrook, Joseph D.; Pilliod, David S.; Arkle, Robert S.; Rachlow, Janet L.; Vierling, Kerri T.; Wiest, Michelle M.
Title: Transition of Vegetation States Positively Affects Harvester Ants in the Great Basin, United States
Observations: shrub density data is not present in this paper and no data regarding facilitation either

Author: Cosentino, Bradley J.; Schooley, Robert L.; Bestelmeyer, Brandon T.; Kelly, Jeffrey F.; Coffman, John M.
Title: Constraints and time lags for recovery of a keystone species (Dipodomys spectabilis) after landscape restoration
Observations: has data on shrub density itself but no data on facilitation or positive interations (even though it is mentioned several times in the paper)

Author: Malo, Aurelio F.; Godsall, Ben; Prebble, Clare; Grange, Zoe; McCandless, Samantha; Taylor, Andrew; Coulson, Tim
Title: Positive effects of an invasive shrub on aggregation and abundance of a native small rodent
Observations: does not have data on shrub density (has data on tick density) and does not mention facilitation or positive interactions

Author: Martinez-Garza, Cristina; Osorio-Beristain, Marcela; Valenzuela-Galvan, David; Nicolas-Medina, Alondra
Title: Intra and inter-annual variation in seed rain in a secondary dry tropical forest excluded from chronic disturbance
Observations: looks at seed density rather than shrub density and does not entirely look at facilitation or positive interactions

Author: Lenda, Magdalena; Skorka, Piotr
Title: Patch occupancy, number of individuals and population density of the Marbled White in a changing agricultural landscape
Observations: has a bunch of data on shrubs and shurb density but nothing on facilitation or positive interactions

Author: Aragon, Susan; Woodcock, Deborah W.
Title: Plant Community Structure and Conservation of a Northern Peru Sclerophyllous Forest
Observations: has a bunch of data for density but does not specifically have any data on facilitation or positive interactions (It does talk about it though in a decent amount)

Author: Joshi, Atul Arvind; Mudappa, Divya; Raman, T. R. Shankar
Title: Brewing trouble: coffee invasion in relation to edges and forest structure in tropical rainforest fragments of the Western Ghats, India
Observations: has data for shrub density specifically but nothing directly for facilitative or positive interactions

Author: van Duyne, Caroline; Ras, Erica; de Vos, Anneleen E. W.; de Boer, Willem F.; Henkens, Rene J. H. G.; Usukhjargal, Dorj
Title: Wolf Predation Among Reintroduced Przewalski Horses in Hustai National Park, Mongolia
Observations: has final density data for some shrub species but has no data on facilitation or positive interactions

Author: Farris, Emmanuele; Filigheddu, Rossella
Title: Effects of browsing in relation to vegetation cover on common yew (Taxus baccata L.) recruitment in Mediterranean environments
Observations: paper looks at English Yew Density (not a shrub but a tree) even though it looks at them when they are saplings. Also has no data for facilitation or positive interactions

Author: Bas, Josep M.; Pons, Pere; Gomez, Crisanto
Title: Exclusive frugivory and seed dispersal of Rhamnus alaternus in the bird breeding season
Observations: paper looks more at overall seed count rather than species density. No connection to positive interaction of facilitation

Author: Cuevas-Reyes, P; Quesada, M; Hanson, P; Dirzo, R; Oyama, K
Title: Diversity of gall-inducing insects in a Mexican tropical dry forest: the importance of plant species richness, life-forms, host plant age and plant density
Observations: paper has the density for several plant species (including some shrub species) but does not tie it back to positive interactions or facilitation

Author: Verdu, M; Garcia-Fayos, P
Title: Frugivorous birds mediate sex-biased facilitation in a dioecious nurse plant
Observations: paper does not look at shrub density with facilitation. Looks at "bulk" density.

Author: Fields, MJ; Coffin, DP; Gosz, JR
Title: Burrowing activities of kangaroo rats and patterns in plant species dominance at a shortgrass steppe-desert grassland ecotone
Observations: paper makes no connection to shrub density and facilitation. Looks at grasses. Not useful

Author: Ostfeld, RS; Manson, RH; Canham, CD
Title: Effects of rodents on survival of tree seeds and seedlings invading old fields
